Tips.InstallUE4SS: Install UE4SS. After installation, launch the game once to generate required files and folders.
Tips.FixUE4SS: Attempt to repair UE4SS — copy any missing files into the Win64 directory. This will not overwrite existing files.
Tips.UninstallUE4SS: Remove UE4SS.dll. If an injection backup exists, restore the injection as well.
Tips.ManualInjectUE4SS: Inject UE4SS.dll into the game EXE if UE4SS does not start with the game after installation.
Tips.RestoreInjectionUE4SS: Restore the game EXE using the backup created by static injection.
Tips.InstallMod: Install and register the mod's modules.
Tips.FixMod: Attempt to reinstall and register the mod's modules. This will not overwrite existing files.
Tips.UninstallMod:
Uninstall the mod's modules.
Warning: if you have modified the mod, use this with caution — this will remove all modules.
Tips.OpenSaveFolder: Open the game's save folder. It's recommended to back up saves before installing mods.
Tips.QuickLaunch: Bypass Steam to quickly launch the game for debugging. Note: DLC levels will be unavailable.

Messages.InjectBackupExists: Injection backup detected. Do not inject again.
Messages.NoInjectBackup: No injection backup detected; the game may not have been injected. If a backup was lost but injection already occurred and the game won't start, run integrity check or reinstall the game.
Messages.SelectModToView: Select a mod to view details
Messages.UE4SSMissingForNonPak: UE4SS is not installed — mods containing non-PAK modules cannot be installed.
Messages.BPModulePartialEffect: Parts of the Blueprint module may still take effect in-game, causing unexpected issues. It's recommended to uninstall this mod.
Messages.PakModUsableWithoutUE4SS: This mod only contains PAK modules and can be used without UE4SS installed.
Messages.AutoDetectGamePathFailed: Failed to auto-detect the game directory; please set it manually.
Messages.InvalidGamePath: The selected directory is invalid — game executable not found.
Messages.SetDllNotFound: Injection tool setdll.exe not found (may have been removed by antivirus).
Messages.InjectBackupSkip: Backup file {0} detected; injection skipped to avoid overwriting the backup.
Messages.InjectTimeout: Injection process timed out and was terminated.
Messages.InjectNonZeroExit: Injection tool returned non-zero exit code: {0}. Check file paths and permissions.
Messages.InjectBackupMissing: Backup file not found; the game may not have been injected.
Messages.LogicModsMissing: logicMods folder not found. After installing UE4SS, launch the game once. If still missing, try manual injection.
Messages.AOBMissing: AOB scripts not found — UE4SS may not function correctly. Try repairing or reinstalling.
Messages.InjectBackupResidual: Residual injection backup detected — the game may fail to start due to leftover DLL dependencies. Please restore injection.
Messages.InstallUE4SSSuccess: UE4SS installed successfully. Please launch the game once to generate required files and folders.
Messages.RestoreInjectSuccess: Injection backup restored; injection has been reverted.
Messages.TryManualInject: If UE4SS does not start with the game, try static injection

Description.GTypeOrigin: Adds three homage stages in the style of Gradius.
Description.SimpleBossLifeBar: Adds a simple health bar for boss battles. Not compatible with Boss Rush mode.
Description.RTF2DebugTools: A cheat/debugging tool for level testing. Do not use for unfair competitive purposes.
Description.FPSPlayer: Turns the gameplay into a first-person shooter mode. Requires activation via the UE4SS Mod button.
